column4: Which time? when I first stick it in the drive, reboot, then do the enter thing? Or do you mean when it reboots the second time?
It says nothing to me. I guess I was unclear. It gets no farther than "Booting Kernel" before it reboots ad infintium.
it's a string (hash) that represents all of the data on a disc or in a file.
yeah, but you need to check that against the md5 hash generated from the file you have on your HDD
